subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ben Brust hit a tying shot from just inside midcourt as time expired and then hit a 3-pointer in overtime to give Wisconsin a victory over No. 3 Michigan.
snippet: Ben Brust hit a tying shot from just inside midcourt as time expired and then hit a 3-pointer in overtime to give Wisconsin a victory over No. 3 Michigan.
